name: Building Decentralized AI Apps using Swarm
description: Building Decentralized AI Apps using Swarm

speakers.name: Elad Verbin
speakers.bio: Dr. Elad Verbin is a Data Scientist and Computer Scientist, specializing in predictive modeling and algorithm engineering. He is a partner in Berlin Innovation Ventures, an early stage deep tech VC. He believes in decentralization as a means for social change. In blockchain space, he works on governance and is currently thinking about blockchain macroeconomics.
